control_description: Check if any security group allows ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::0/0 to the ports for kerberos [88, 464, 749, 750] or ldap [389, 636].
risk: Security Groups & Medium & Security-Group allows inbound traffic for Kerberos and LDAP ports.
recommendation: Make sure to limit inbound traffic as strictly as possible.
